title: Aid
contents: property | V, S, M (a tiny strip of white cloth)
text | Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Max HP and current HP increase by 5 for the duration
text | The HP increases by an additional 5 hit points for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Animate Dead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust)

text | You animate a pile of bones or a corpse into an undead that follows your commands. As a bonus action you mentally command any creature made by this spell if it is within 60 feet of you. You must recast this every 24 hours to maintain it for up to 4 creatures.
text | For each slot level above 3rd this spell animates or maintains control over 2 additional creatures.

title: Antimagic Field
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron or iron filings)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | A 10-foot sphere surrounds you in which magic does not function. Spells can't be case, summoned creatures disappear, and magic items become mundane within sphere.
text | Spells are suppressed within the sphere, but still consume their duration, and resume when the sphere no longer suppresses them.
text | Artifacts and deity magic are unaffected by this spell.

title: Bane
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of blood)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Up to three creatures within range must make a Charisma save. On a failure a creature must roll 1d4 and subtract the result from all attack rolls and saving throws for the duration.
text | For each slot level above 1st used for this spell, target one additional creature.

title: Beacon of Hope
contents: property | Duration | Cocentration, up to 1 minute
text | Choose any number of creatures within range. Those affected have advantage on Wisdom and death saving throws, and recovers the maximum number of HP possible from healing effects.

title: Astral Projection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (for each creature affected, you must provide a jacinth worth 10,000 gp and one ornately carved silver bar worth 100 gp)
text | You and up to eight willing creatures project your astral selves into the Astral Plane.
text | Creatures are returned to their bodies when either: dismissed by you as an action; their astral bodies or regular bodies are dropped to 0 HP.
text | Your projections can enter other planes, transporting your bodies with you to the new Plane.

title: Augury
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (specially marked sticks, bones, or similar tokens worth 25 gp)
text | You cast bones, play cards, or some other divination method to decipher how an event will work out within the next 30 minutes.

title: Bestow Curse
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The creature touched must make a Wisdom saving throw or receives one of the following effects: Disadvantage on checks and saves with on ability score; disadvantage on attack rolls against you; target makes a wisdom saving throw every turn or does nothing; or you spells and attacks deal an extra 1d8 damage.
text | The duration goes up to 10 minutes with a 4th level slot, 8 hours for 5th, 24 hours for 7th, and until dispelled for 9th.

title: Blade Barrier
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You create a wall of whirling blades that can manifest as a straight wall up to 100 feet long, 20 feet high, and 5 feet thick; or a ringed wall up to 60 feet in diameter.
text | When a creature enters the wall's area it must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes 6d10 slashing damage on a failed save, half damage with a success.

title: Bless
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Up to three creatures within range can choose to add 1d4 to any attack roll made during the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for every slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Blindness/Deafness
contents: text | One creature within range must make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails it is blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. The creature can make a new save on each of its turns to end this effect.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Calm Emotions
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | All creatures within 20 feet of a point you designate within range make a Charisma saving throw or suffer from one of two effects:
text | Suppress charm or frightened effects; or
text | Make targets indifferent to creatures it was hostile toward.
text | Creatures can willingly fail the Charisma saving throw.

title: Clairvoyance
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 100 gp, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | An invisible sensor appears in the place of your choosing that you can choose to either hear or see through.

title: Commune
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense and a vial or holy or unholy water)
text | You contact your deity or a deity's proxy and may ask up to three questions over the duration and receive true, yes-or-no answers.

title: Conjure Celestial
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You conjure a celestial of CR4 or lower in an unoccupied space within range. It will follow your commands and is considered friendly toward you.
text | If a 9th-level slot is used for this spell, you may conjure a Celestial of CR5 or lower.

title: Contagion
contents: text | Make a melee spell attack. On a hit the target must make one Constitution save per turn until it either fails or passes three times. Upon three failures, one of the effects on the accompanying card takes place.

title: Continual Flame
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)
text | A flame the equivalent in brightness to a torch is created. It gives off no heat and doesn't consume oxygen. A Continual Flame can be hidden or covered but never quenched.

title: Control Water
contents: property | V, S, M (a drop of water and a pinch of dust)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You take control of a 100-foot cube of standing water within range and manipulate it with: Flood, creating a 20-foot rise in water level; Part Water, making a trench; Redirect Flow, even over and around obstacles; or Vortex. Creatures can escape the Vortex with a Athletics saving throw, but take 2d8 bludgeoning damage every round they are in the vortex.

title: Control Weather
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (Burning incense and bits of earth and wood mixed with water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 8 hours
text | You take control of the weather within a 5-mile radius. You can alter the condition of the weather over the course of 1d4 x 10 minutes as often as you wish for the duration.

title: Create Food/Water
contents: text | You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers nearby, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours. The food is bland but nourishing and spoils after 24 hours if uneaten. The water is clean and doesn't go bad.

title: Create/Destroy Water
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of water if creating water or a few grains of sand if destroying water)
text | You create up to 10 gallons of water within range in an open container or make rain in a 30-foot cube; or you destroy up to 10 gallons of water or a 30-foot cube of fog.
text | You create/destroy an additional 10 gallons of 5 cubic feet of water for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Create Undead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (one clay pot full of grave dirt, one with brackish water, and an onyx worth 150 gp for each corpse)

text | You can only cast this spell at night. You choose up to three medium or small corpses and turn them into Ghouls under your command. You must cast this spell again within 24 hours or the Ghouls will stop obeying you.
text | You can create and maintain additional creatures and creature types with higher slot levels.

title: Cure Wounds
contents: text | A creature you touch is healed a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The hit points healed increase by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Daylight
contents: text | Bright light emanates from a point or object you designate within range for the duration. Covering the source of the light suppresses the effect.

title: Death Ward
contents: text | The affected creature is protected somewhat against death. The first time the creature would drop to 0 HP, it instead drops to 1 HP and the spell ends. If the target is subject to an effect that would cause instant death without dealing damage, the effect is negated and the spell ends.

title: Detect Evil & Good
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You know if there is an aberration, fiend, fey, celestial, elemental, or undead within 30 feet of you. You also know if a place or object within 30 feet has been consecrated or desecrated.

title: Detect Magic
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura and determine the school of magic, if any.

title: Detect Poison & Disease
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a yew leaf)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you can sense the presence, location, and type of poison, disease, and poisonous creatures within 30 feet of you.

title: Dispel Evil & Good
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Fey, Undead, Celestials, Fiends, and elementals have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
text | You can touch a creature charmed, frightened, or possessed by one of the above creatures, ending that effect and this spell's effect.
text | You can make a melee spell attack on a creature mentioned above. On a hit the creature must make a Charisma save or be sent to its home plane. This ends the spell's effect.

title: Dispel Magic
contents: text | A single 3rd-level or lower spell effect within range chosen by you is dispelled. For 4th-level and higher effects, you must make a DC 10 + the spell's level check to dispel it.
text | This automatically dispels a spell effect of an equal or lower level of the slot level used to cast it.

title: Divination
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense and a sacrificial offering, worth 25 gp, which the spell consumes)
text | You contact a god or a god's servants and can ask a single question pertaining to an activity to occur within the next 7 days and receive a truthful reply.

title: Divine Word
contents: text | Any number of creatures within range are affected depending on their current HP. A Charisma saving throw negates these effects:
text | <40 HP: deafened and blinded for 10 minutes;
text | <30 HP: Blinded, deafened, and stunned for 1 hour; or

title: Earthquake
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dirt, a piece of rock, and a lump of clay)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 100-foot radius area within range that you can see tremors and shakes, becoming difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Creatures casting a spell in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or the spell fails.

title: Enhance Ability
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (fur or a feather from a beast)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The touched creature gains Advantage on one type of ability check for the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for every slot above 2nd level used to cast this spell.

title: Etherealness
contents: text | You partially enter the Ethereal Plane, allowing you to move through solid objects and even move in any direction for the duration.
text | If you cast this spell using a slot of 8th level or higher, you can target up to three willing creatures for each slot level above 7th used.

title: Feign Death
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of graveyard dirt)
text | You touch a willing creature and put it into a state of sleep similar to death. To all outward examinations, the creature is dead for the duration of the spell.

title: Find the Path
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a set of divinatory tools worth 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 day

text | The spell shows you the shortest, most direct route to your chosen destination. As long as the spell lasts and your destination is on the same plane of existence, you know the direction and distance to your destination.

title: Find Traps
contents: text | This spell reveals the presence of traps within range of the spell, but not their location.

title: Fire Storm
contents: text | A storm of fire consisting of ten 10-foot cubes of fire appear, connected to one another, arranged as you wish. Creatures caught in the area take 7d10 fire damage, Dexterity save for half damage. You can choose if the fire ignites plant life or not.

title: Flame Strike
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of sulfur)

text | A 10-foot radius, 40-foot high cylinder of divine fire appears in your designated location, dealing 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage to all creatures within its effect. Creatures make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage.
text | Either the fire or radiant damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Forbiddance
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water, rare incense, and powdered ruby worth at least 1,000 gp)

text | An area of 40,000 square feet (30 feet high) is protected against magical travel. Choose Elemental, Fey, Fiend, Celestial, or Undead when casting this spell. Creatures of the chosen type who enter or start their turn in the spell's area take 5d10 radiant or necrotic damage (your choice).
text | If you cast Forbiddance every day for 30 days, the effect becomes permanent.

title: Freedom of Movement
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a leather strap, bound around the arm or similar appendage)

text | A willing creature touched, for the duration, is unhampered by difficult terrain, cannot be restrained or paralyzed, can spend 5 feet of movement to escape nonmagical restraints, and has no movement penalty for being underwater.

title: Gate
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 5,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You open a gate to another Plane of existence within range. The portal lasts for the duration and any creature can pass through it from one plane to the other. When you cast the spell, you may name a specific creature. If that creature is on the plane you are creating a Gate to, the portal opens next to it and draws it through to your plane. You have no control over it, however.

title: Gaes
contents: text | The targeted creature is given a service or task by you. It must make a Wisdom save to resist this effect. On a failed save, the creature must act to carry out the task demanded. The creature takes 5d10 psychic damage each time it performs an action that is counter to your instructions.
text | If you use a 7th or 8th level slot for this spell, the duration becomes 1 year. If you use a 9th level slot, it becomes permanent.

title: Gentle Repose
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of salt and one copper piece for each of the corpse's eyes)
text | A corpse you touch does not decay and cannot be turned into an undead for the duration. This also effectively extends the time limit on the spell Raise Dead

title: Glyph of Warding
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense and powdered diamond worth at least 200 gp)
property | Duration | Until dispelled or triggered

text | You inscribe a glyph on a surface or object and set a trigger condition for it. The glyph either explodes dealing 5d8 elemental damage in a 20-ft. radius (DEX half) or triggers a spell of 3rd level or lower.
text | Damage and spell slots increase by 1d8 or 1 level for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Greater Restoration
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes)
text | You reduce to target's exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects:
text | One Charm or Petrify effect;
text | one curse, including attunement to a cursed item;
text | any one ability score reduction; or

title: Guardian of Faith
contents: text | A Large guardian appears in an unoccupied space you designate within range. Whenever a creature comes within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time, it must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 20 radiant damage, half damage on a successful save. The guardian vanishes once it has dealt 60 damage, or the spell expires.

title: Guidance
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Before the spell ends, the touched creature can roll 1d4 and add the result to any one ability check.

title: Guiding Bolt
contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack against a target within range. The target takes 4d6 radiant damage and the next attack made against it before the end of your next turn has advantage.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Hallow
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (herbs, oils, and incense worth at least 1,000 gp, which is consumed)

text | A 60-foot radius area is infused with holy or unholy power. Celestials, Fey, Fiends, Undead, and Elementals cannot enter the area, unless you choose to exclude one or more of those groups upon casting. You can also bind an extra effect to the area: Courage, Darkness, Daylight, Energy Protection, Energy Vulnerability, Everlasting Rest, Extradimensional Interference, Fear, Silence, or Tongues.

title: Harm
contents: text | You deal 14d6 necrotic damage to a creature within range. It can make a Constitution saving throw for half damage. This spell cannot reduce a creature's HP below 1. If the target failed its Constitution save, it has its Maximum HP reduced by the amount of damage the spell dealt for 1 hour. Any effect that removes disease removes this effect as well.

title: Heal
contents: text | This spell heals 70 hit points to any creature within range, and also cures blindness, deafness, and any diseases affecting it. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The creature heals an additional 10 hit points for every slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Healing Word
contents: text | A creature of your choice that you can see within range is healed 1d4 + you spellcasting ability modifier hit points. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The creature heals an extra 1d4 hit points for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Heroes' Feast
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (1 gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp)

text | You summon forth a great feast that takes up to one hour to consume for up to 12 creatures. Any creature that partakes of the feast is cured of all diseases and poisons, is immune to poison and being frightened, has advantage on Wisdom saving throws, and has their Max HP increase by 2d10 for 24 hours.

title: Hold Person
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A humanoid within range must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. A paralyzed humanoid can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end this effect.
text | You can target one additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell. All targets must be within 30 feet of each other.

title: Holy Aura
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny reliquary worth at least 1,000 gp containing a sacred relic)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Creatures you choose within 30 feet of you have advantage on all saving throws for the duration, and creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against them. If a Fiend or Undead attempts to attack a creature under the effect of this spell, it must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded for the duration.

title: Inflict Wounds
contents: text | Make a melee spell attack on a creature you can reach. On a hit, the creature takes 3d10 necrotic damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Insect Plague
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A 20-foot radius sphere of locusts appears centered on a spot within range. All within the sphere take 4d10 piercing damage, halved with a Constitution saving throw. Any creature that enters or ends their turn in the area take this damage.
text | the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Legend Lore
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense worth 250 gp, and four ivory strips worth 50 gp each)
text | You find out information about a legendary figure or item that you name. The lore is always accurate, but possibly vague.

title: Lesser Restoration
contents: text | You touch a creature and end one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) affecting it.

title: Light
contents: property | Components | V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
text | You touch an object that is no larger than 10 feet in any one dimension. That object shines brightly for 20 feet, and dimly for 20 feet beyond that.

title: Locate Creature
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you, You sense the direction to the creature's location if that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

title: Locate Object
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a forked twig)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. If that object is within 1,000 feet of you then you know the direction and distance to it.

title: Magic Circle
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp)

text | A 10-foot radius, 20-foot tall cylinder appears and you select celestials, fey, fiends, elementals, or undead. The chosen creature cannot enter the circle, has disadvantage on those within the circle, and cannot charm or frighten those within the circle.
text | You can choose to reverse this effect to trap a creature in the circle instead.
text | The duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Mass Cure Wounds
contents: text | Choose up to 6 creatures within 30 feet of a point you choose within range. Each creature regains 3d8 + your spellcasting modifier hit points. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The hit points regained increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Mass Heal
contents: text | You heal up to 700 total hit points spread out over any number of creatures within range. Creatures healed by this spell are cured of all diseases and of any effect making them blind or deafened. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

title: Mass Healing Word
contents: text | Up to six creatures within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | Creatures heal an additional 1d4 for each slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Meld into Stone
contents: text | You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body. While merged with the stone you cannot see what occurs outside it. You remain aware of the passage of time and can cast spells on yourself. Leaving the stone ends the spell effect and you can only leave the stone where you entered it.

title: Mending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (two lodestones)
text | This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch. This can physically restore a magic item or construct, but cannot restore the magical abilities to such items.

title: Planar Ally
contents: text | You beseech a god, demon prince, or some other powerful otherworldly entity for aid. It sends an Outsider to you which you can then bargain with for aid. The price is dependent on the task requested.

title: Planar Binding
contents: property | Components | V. S. M (a jewel worth at least 1,000 gp)

text | You bind a celestial, elemental, fiend, or fey to your service for the duration. The creature must be present for the entirety of the spellcasting and makes a Charisma saving throw. If it fails the save, it is bound to do your bidding for the duration.
text | The duration increases to 10 days if a 7th-level slot is used, 180 days for an 8th, and a year and a day for a 9th.

title: Plane Shift
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a forked metal rod worth 250 gp)

text | You and up to 8 willing creatures are transported to another plane of existence of your choosing. If you use this to banish an otherworldly creature instead, make a melee spell attack against it. On a hit, the creature must make a Charisma saving throw or be banished to a random location on the plane you choose.

title: Prayer of Healing
contents: text | Up to six creatures within range regain 2d8 + your spellcasting modifier hit points. This spell has no effect on undead and constructs.
text | Creatures regain an additional 1d8 hit points for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Protection from Energy
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, one creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice from: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

title: Protection from Evil/Good
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | Touched creature has protection against Aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead for the duration. Those creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target, the target cannot be charmed, possessed or frightened by those creature types.

title: Protection from Poison
contents: text | Touched creature is cured of one type of poison. For the duration, the creature has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and has resistance to poison damage.

title: Purify Food and Drink
contents: text | All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on a spot you choose is rendered free from poison and disease.

title: Raise Dead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth 500 gp)
text | You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided it has been dead for no more than 10 days. If the soul is willing to return to the body, it returns to life with 1 hit point.
text | Creatures brought back this way suffer a -4 penalty to attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. This penalty is reduced by 1 every time the creature completes a long rest.

title: Regenerate
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a prayer wheel and holy water)
text | Touched creature regains 4d8 + 15 hit points instantly. For the duration, the target also regains 1 hit point at the start of each turn (10 HP per minute).
text | The target's severed body members are restored after 2 minutes as long as you hold the severer part against the stump.

title: Remove Curse
contents: text | At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its attunement to the owner of the object so it can be removed or discarded.

title: Resurrection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (1 diamond worth 1,000 gp)
text | You touch a dead creature that has been dead no more than a century that didn't die of old age and isn't undead, and bring it back to life.
text | Creatures brought back this way take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, and ability checks, decreasing the penalty by 1 for every long rest completed.
text | After casting this spell, you cannot cast spells and have disadvantage on attacks, saves, and ability checks until you finish a long rest.

title: Revivify
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp)
text | You touch a creature that has died within the past minute and return it to life with 1 hit point. This does not work on creatures that died of old age, nor can it restore lost body parts.

title: Sacred Flame
contents: text | Flames descend on a creature within range that you can see. That creature makes a Dexterity saving throw or takes 1d8 radiant damage. The damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th level, and 4d8 at 17th level.

title: Sanctuary
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small silver mirror)

text | A creature within range is warded from attacks. Any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the creature must select a new target or lost the attack or spell.
text | This effect ends if the warded creature attacks or casts a spell that affects an enemy creature.

title: Scrying
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You attempt to see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence. The target makes a Wisdom save, which is modified by the target's knowledge and physical connection to you.
text | On a successful save, the spell fails and you cannot target that creature again for 24 hours. On a failure, you see all within 10 feet of the target.

title: Sending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a short piece of fine copper wire)
text | You send a short message to any creature with which you are familiar. The creature hears the message in its mind and can respond immediately.
text | This can send a message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but there is a 5% chance it fails if the recipient is on another plane.

title: Shield of Faith
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | A shimmering force surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting +2 AC for the duration.

title: Silence
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | For the duration, no sound can enter or pass trough a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point you designate within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and are deafened while inside. Spells that require verbal components are impossible in the sphere.

title: Spare the Dying
contents: text | You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature be comes stable. This has no effect on undead or constructs.

title: Speak with Dead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (burning incense)
text | A corpse within range that has not been the target of this spell in the last 10 days answers up to five questions over the duration. The corpse knows only what it knew in life.

title: Spirit Guardians
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a holy symbol)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | Spirits form a 15-foot radius ring of protection around you. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area take 3d8 radiant (good) or necrotic (evil) damage, Wisdom save for half damage, and have their movement halved.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Spiritual Weapon
contents: text | A floating, spectral weapon appears within range. When you cast this spell, make a melee spell attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the creature takes 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier force damage. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and attack with it.
text | The damage dealt by the weapon increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Stone Shape
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (soft clay)

text | You touch a stone object of medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose. The object can have up to 2 hinges and a latch, but nothing more mechanically complicated than that.

title: Symbol
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (mercury, phosphorous, and powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Until dispelled or triggered
text | You transcribe a glyph or rune that triggers on a condition you set and can cause: death; discord; fear; hopelessness; insanity; pain; sleep; or stunning

title: Thaumaturgy
contents: text | You create one of the following effects:

text | your voice booms three times as loud; you cause flames to flicker and change for 1 minute; you cause harmless tremors for 1 minute; you create a harmless sound within range; you cause an unlocked door or window to fly open; or you alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute
text | You can have up to three of these 1-minute effects active at once.

title: Tongues
contents: property | Components | V, M (a small clay model of a ziggurat)
text | The touched creature gains the ability to speak and understand any language for the duration.

title: True Resurrection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth 25,000 gp)

text | You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died of something other than old age. This spell brings the creature back to life, even creating a new body if the old one is not available, in which case you must speak the creature's name to perform the spell.

title: True Seeing
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an ointment for the eyes that costs 25 gp)
text | For the duration, a willing creature you touched has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.

title: Warding Bond
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (A pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp)

text | You touch a willing creature and create a connection between you. For the duration, the creature has +1 AC and to all saving throws, and has resistance to all damage. Whenever the creature takes damage, you take the same amount of damage. The spell ends if you drop to 0 hit points or if the target moves farther than 60 feet from you.

title: Water Walk
contents: property | Components | V, S, M ( a piece of cork)

text | This spell grants up to 10 creatures within range the ability to walk on water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava as if it were a solid surface, though those walking on lava still take damage from the heat. If an affected creature is submerged, they float toward the surface at a pace of 60 feet per round.

title: Word of Recall
contents: text | You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you are instantly teleported to a previously designated sanctuary. You designate a sanctuary by casting this spell in a location strongly linked to your deity.

title: Zone of Truth
contents: text | You create a 15-foot radius area where creature can only speak truth. Creatures within this area make a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, they cannot willingly tell a lie. You know whether each creature in the area succeeds or fails its save. Creatures in the area also know they are under the effects of this spell and can thus refuse to answer a question they would normally lie in response to.

title: Banishment
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The target must make a Charisma save or be banished. If the target is native to your current plane, it is banished for the duration, but returns at the end of it. If it is native to another plane it is returned there and does not return if concentration is maintained for the duration.
text | Target an additional creature for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Contagion Effects
contents: text | Subject is blinded and has disadvantage on Wisdom saves and checks;
text | Subject has disadvantage on Strength checks, saves, and attacks;
text | Subject has disadvantage on Charisma checks and vulnerability to all types of damage;
text | Subject has disadvantage on Intelligence saves and checks and acts as if Confused in combat;
text | Subject has disadvantage on Dexterity checks, saves, and attacks; or
text | Subject has disadvantage on Constitution saves and checks and starts to bleed from any type of damage.

title: Command (Knowledge)
contents: text | The target must pass a Wisdom saving throw or else follow a one-word command issued by you on its next turn. Commands can be: Approach; Drop; Flee; Grovel; Halt; or other one-word commands.
text | You can affect one additional creature within 30 feet of the initial target for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Identify (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pearl worth at least 100 gp)

text | You learn the magical properties of any item you hold while casting this spell, as well as how to use those properties. You learn what spells are affecting the object, as well as whether it was created by a spell or not, and which spell.
text | If you touch a creature while casting this spell instead, you learn which spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

title: Augury (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (specially marked sticks, bones, or similar tokens worth 25 gp)
text | You cast bones, play cards, or some other divination method to decipher how an event will work out within the next 30 minutes.

title: Suggestion (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, M (a snake's tongue and honeycomb or sweet oil)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 8 hours
text | You suggest a course of action for a target within range. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it performs the suggested course of action to the best of its ability.

title: Nondetection (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp)

text | For the duration the creature you touch cannot be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. This effect can also be placed over an area or object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.

title: Speak with Dead (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (burning incense)
text | A corpse within range that has not been the target of this spell in the last 10 days answers up to five questions over the duration. The corpse knows only what it knew in life.

title: Arcane Eye (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of bat fur)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You create an invisible floating eye that you can receive visual information from for the duration. The eye can be moved up to 30 feet per round and has no limit on how far away from you it can be, It cannot pass through solid objects, but can fit through a space as small as a 1-inch square. The eye has darkvision out to 30 feet.

title: Confusion (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (three nut shells)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Creatures within a 10-foot radius sphere centered on a spot within range make a Wisdom save. On a failure, a creature must roll 1d10 at the start of its turn to determine its action. See page 224 for possible effects.
text | The radius of influence increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Legend Lore (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense worth 250 gp, and four ivory strips worth 50 gp each)
text | You find out information about a legendary figure or item that you name. The lore is always accurate, but possibly vague.

title: Scrying (Knowledge)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You attempt to see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence. The target makes a Wisdom save, which is modified by the target's knowledge and physical connection to you. On a successful save, the spell fails and you cannot target that creature again for 24 hours. On a failure, you see all within 10 feet of the target for the duration.

title: Bless (Life)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Up to three creatures within range can choose to add 1d4 to any attack roll made during the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for every slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Cure Wounds (Life)
contents: text | A creature you touch is healed a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The hit points healed increase by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Lesser Restoration (Life)
contents: text | You touch a creature and end one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) affecting it.

title: Spiritual Weapon (Life)
contents: text | A floating, spectral weapon appears within range. When you cast this spell, make a melee spell attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the creature takes 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier force damage. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and attack with it.
text | The damage dealt by the weapon increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Beacon of Hope (Life)
contents: property | Duration | Cocentration, up to 1 minute
text | Choose any number of creatures within range. Those affected have advantage on Wisdom and death saving throws, and recovers the maximum number of HP possible from healing effects.

title: Revivify (Life)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp)
text | You touch a creature that has died within the past minute and return it to life with 1 hit point. This does not work on creatures that died of old age, nor can it restore lost body parts.

title: Death Ward (Life)
contents: text | The affected creature is protected somewhat against death. The first time the creature would drop to 0 HP, it instead drops to 1 HP and the spell ends. If the target is subject to an effect that would cause instant death without dealing damage, the effect is negated and the spell ends.

title: Guardian of Faith (Life)
contents: text | A Large guardian appears in an unoccupied space you designate within range. Whenever a creature comes within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time, it must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 20 radiant damage, half damage on a successful save. The guardian vanishes once it has dealt 60 damage, or the spell expires.

title: Mass Cure Wounds (Life)
contents: text | Choose up to 6 creatures within 30 feet of a point you choose within range. Each creature regains 3d8 + your spellcasting modifier hit points. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | The hit points regained increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Raise Dead (Life)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth 500 gp)
text | You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided it has been dead for no more than 10 days. If the soul is willing to return to the body, it returns to life with 1 hit point.
text | Creatures brought back this way suffer a -4 penalty to attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. This penalty is reduced by 1 every time the creature completes a long rest.

title: Burning Hands (Light)
contents: text | All creatures within a 15-foot cone in front of you take 3d6 fire damage, but take half damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw. This also ignites all flammable objects in range as well.
text | The damage dealt by this spell increases by 1d6 for every slot level above 1st used during casting.

title: Faerie Fire (Light)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | All objects in a 20-foot cube are outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Any creatures in the area are also outlined, unless the succeed on a Dexterity saving throw. Attack rolls made against outlined creatures have advantage and outlines creatures do not benefit from invisibility.

title: Flaming Sphere (Light)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 5-foot diameter sphere of fire appears where you designate. Creatures that end their turn within 5 feet of the sphere take 2d6 fire damage, Dexterity save for half damage. On your turn you can direct the sphere as a move action.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Scorching Ray (Light)
contents: text | You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can target separate creatures with each or target one creature with multiple rays. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.
text | One additional ray is created for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Daylight (Light)
contents: text | Bright light emanates from a point or object you designate within range for the duration. Covering the source of the light suppresses the effect.

title: Fireball (Light)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

text | A 20-foot explosion of fire erupts from the target point, dealing 8d6 fire damage to all creatures within the area. Creatures make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage. Unattended flammable objects catch fire.
text | An additional 1d6 damage is dealt for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Guardian of Faith (Light)
contents: text | A Large guardian appears in an unoccupied space you designate within range. Whenever a creature comes within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time, it must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 20 radiant damage, half damage on a successful save. The guardian vanishes once it has dealt 60 damage, or the spell expires.

title: Wall of Fire (Light)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small piece of phosphorous)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A wall of fire up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high and 1 foot thick appears within range. Creatures within the area take 5d8 fire damage, halved with a successful Dexterity check. Upon casting, you choose one side of the wall. Creature that enter or start their turn with 10 feet of that side of the wall take 5d8 fire damage, and again if they pass through the wall.

title: Flame Strike (Light)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of sulfur)

text | A 10-foot radius, 40-foot high cylinder of divine fire appears in your designated location, dealing 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage to all creatures within its effect. Creatures make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage.
text | Either the fire or radiant damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Scrying (Light)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You attempt to see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence. The target makes a Wisdom save, which is modified by the target's knowledge and physical connection to you. On a successful save, the spell fails and you cannot target that creature again for 24 hours. On a failure, you see all within 10 feet of the target for the duration.

title: Animal Friendship (Nature)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a morsel of food)
text | A beast within range that can see and hear you must make a Wisdom save or be charmed for the duration. Harm from you or your allies ends the effect.
text | When you case this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional beast for every slot level above 1st.

title: Speak with Animals (Nature)
contents: text | You gain the ability to speak and understand beasts for the duration.

title: Barkskin (Nature)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a handful of oak bark)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Touched creature's AC cannot be less than 16 for the duration and takes on a rough, bark-like appearance.

title: Spike Growth (Nature)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (seven sharp thorns)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | A 20-foot radius area of ground is covered with spikes and thorns. Creatures within the area and entering it take 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 feet they travel through the area.
text | The area is camouflaged to look natural. Creatures must make a Perception check to notice the thorns before entering/avoiding the area.

title: Plant Growth (Nature)
contents: property | Casting time | 1 action or 8 hours

text | If cast as an action, choose a spot within range that you can see. All plant life within 100 feet of that spot becomes thick and overgrown and creatures must spend 4 feet of movement to move 1 foot.
text | If cast as 8 hours, you enrich the land within half a mile. The plants within range become enriched for 1 year, yielding twice the normal amount of food when harvested.

title: Wind Wall (Nature)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny fan and a feather)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A wall of wind 50 feet long and 15 feet tall appears within range. Creatures in the wall's path when it appears take 3d8 bludgeoning damage, halved with a Dexterity saving throw. The wind wall keeps small or smaller flying creatures and ordinary projectiles away.

title: Dominate Beast (Nature)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You take control of a beast within range for the duration, barring a successful Wisdom saving throw from it. You can order the beast to act as you say or use an action to control the beast precisely. Each time the controlled beast takes damage, it gets a new saving throw.
text | The duration goes up to 10 minutes with a 5th level slot, 1 hour with a 6th, or 8 hours with a 7th.

title: Grasping Vine (Nature)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A vine sprouts from the ground in any space within range. The vine grabs at a creature up to 30 feet away from it that you can see. That creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or be pulled 20 feet toward the vine. Until the spell ends, the vine can lash out at the same creature or another one as a bonus action on your turn.

title: Insect Plague (Nature)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A 20-foot radius sphere of locusts appears centered on a spot within range. All within the sphere take 4d10 piercing damage, halved with a Constitution saving throw. Any creature that enters or ends their turn in the area take this damage.
text | the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Tree Stride (Nature)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You gain the ability to enter a tree and move inside it to inside another tree of the same type within 500 feet. You can use this mode of transportation once per round for the duration, and must end each round outside of a tree.

title: Fog Cloud (Tempest)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You create a 20-foot radius cloud of fog centered on a point you designate within range. It lasts for the duration or until a moderate wind disperses it.
text | The radius of the cloud is extended by 20 feet for each slot level above first used to cast this spell.

title: Thunderwave (Tempest)
contents: text | Creatures within a 15-foot cube of you take 2d8 thunder damage and are pushed 10 feet away. If they make a Constitution saving throw they take half damage and are not pushed.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Gust of Wind (Tempest)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a legume seed)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A blast of wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in the direction you choose. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must make a Strength saving throw of be pushed 15 feet in the direction the wind is blowing. This wind disperses vapors and has a 50% chance to snuff out protected fires. You can redirect the wind each round as a bonus action.

title: Shatter (Tempest)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a chip of mica)

text | A sudden loud, ringing noise emanates in a 10-foot radius from a point you designate within range. Creatures within the area take 2d8 thunder damage, with a Constitution saving throw for half damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Call Lightning (Tempest)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A storm cloud appears 100 feet above you which strikes lightning down on a point you designate within range. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. Creatures take 3d10 damage on a failed save, half on a success.
text | You can use this effect again each round as an action until the duration expires.
text | The damage of this spell increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 3rd used in casting.

title: Sleet Storm (Tempest)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | For the duration, a 20-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder area within range is heavily obscured and flames are doused. The ground becomes difficult terrain and all creatures who start their turn in or enter the area make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Creatures attempting to cast a spell in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

title: Control Water (Tempest)
contents: property | V, S, M (a drop of water and a pinch of dust)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You take control of a 100-foot cube of standing water within range and manipulate it with: Flood, creating a 20-foot rise in water level; Part Water, making a trench; Redirect Flow, even over and around obstacles; or Vortex. Creatures can escape the Vortex with a Athletics saving throw, but take 2d8 bludgeoning damage every round they are in the vortex.

title: Ice Storm (Tempest)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)

text | A 20-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder area within range becomes difficult terrain for 1 round. Any creature in that area takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage, halved with a successful Dexterity saving throw.
text | The bludgeoning damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Destructive Wave (Tempest)
contents: text | A wave of force emanates from you, forcing all creatures within 30 feet to make a Constitution saving throw. Creatures take 5d6 thunder and 5d6 radiant or necrotic (your choice) damage from this and are knocked prone. Creatures who make the saving throw take half damage and are not knocked prone.

title: Insect Plague (Tempest)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A 20-foot radius sphere of locusts appears centered on a spot within range. All within the sphere take 4d10 piercing damage, halved with a Constitution saving throw. Any creature that enters or ends their turn in the area take this damage.
text | the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Charm Person (Trickery)
contents: text | You target one creature within range. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. If it fails it regards you as friendly for the duration or until you or an ally cause harm to it. When the duration ends the creature is aware it was charmed by you.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Disguise Self (Trickery)
contents: text | You change your appearance to that of your choosing, so long as it is still humanoid and no more than 1 foot taller or shorter than your natural height. This does not stand up to physical inspection.
text | To discern that you are disguised, a creature must spend an action and succeed on an Investigation check.

title: Mirror Image (Trickery)
contents: text | Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Each time a creature targets you with an attack, roll 1d20 to determine whether the attack hits you or a duplicate. If all three duplicates are active, a roll of 6 or more hits a duplicate. If 2 duplicates, a roll of 8 or higher targets one. If 1 duplicate, a roll of 11 or higher targets it.

title: Pass Without Trace (Trickery)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, creatures you choose within 30 feet get a +10 bonus on Stealth checks and cannot be tracked by nonmagical means.

title: Blink (Trickery)
contents: text | At the start of every turn for the duration, rill 1d20. On a roll of 11 or higher you disappear into the Ethereal Plane. At the start of your next turn, and when the spell ends, you reappear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of where you disappeared.

title: Dispel Magic (Trickery)
contents: text | A single 3rd-level or lower spell effect within range chosen by you is dispelled. For 4th-level and higher effects, you must make a DC 10 + the spell's level check to dispel it.
text | This automatically dispels a spell effect of an equal or lower level of the slot level used to cast it.

title: Dimension Door (Trickery)
contents: text | You and up to one willing medium-sized creature within 5 feet of you are instantly teleported to a designated spot within range. If you would arrive in a space already occupied by a creature, you and any creature you take with you take 4d6 force damage and the spell fails.

title: Polymorph (Trickery)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a caterpillar cocoon)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | A creature within range is transformed into a new form. This new form can have a CR of up to the transformed creature's CR or level. An unwilling creature can make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid this effect.

title: Dominate Person (Trickery)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You take control of a humanoid within range that you can see, barring a successful Wisdom saving throw. You can control the humanoid telepathically or take precise control over it with an action. Each time the humanoid takes damage, it gets another saving throw.
text | The spell's duration increases to 10 minutes if a 6th level slot is used, 1 hour for a 7th level slot, or 8 hours with an 8th level slot.

title: Modify Memory (Trickery)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A creature that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw or is charmed by you. While the charm lasts you can affect the target's memory of an event that happened within the last 24 hours and lasted no more than 10 minutes.

text | By using a higher slot level, you can modify an event that happened up to 7 days ago (6th level), 30 days ago (7th level), 1 year ago (8th level), or any time in the creature's past (9th level).

title: Divine Favor (War)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage until the spell ends.

title: Shield of Faith (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | A shimmering force surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting +2 AC for the duration.

title: Magic Weapon (War)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, a Weapon touched gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.
text | The bonus to attacks and damage increases to +2 with a 4th level or higher slot or +3 with a 6th level or higher slot.

title: Spiritual Weapon (War)
contents: text | A floating, spectral weapon appears within range. When you cast this spell, make a melee spell attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the creature takes 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier force damage. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and attack with it.
text | The damage dealt by the weapon increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Crusader's Mantle (War)
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | A holy aura emanates from you, allowing all allies within 30 feet of you to deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage when it hits with a melee weapon attack.

title: Spirit Guardians (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a holy symbol)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | Spirits form a 15-foot radius ring of protection around you. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area take 3d8 radiant (good) or necrotic (evil) damage, Wisdom save for half damage, and have their movement halved.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Freedom of Movement (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a leather strap, bound around the arm or similar appendage)

text | A willing creature touched, for the duration, is unhampered by difficult terrain, cannot be restrained or paralyzed, can spend 5 feet of movement to escape nonmagical restraints, and has no movement penalty for being underwater.

title: Stoneskin (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. For the duration, the creature has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

title: Flame Strike (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of sulfur)

text | A 10-foot radius, 40-foot high cylinder of divine fire appears in your designated location, dealing 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage to all creatures within its effect. Creatures make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage.
text | Either the fire or radiant damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Hold Monster (War)
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | A creature within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make a new saving throw to end the effect.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell. All creatures targeted must be within 30 feet of each other.
